name: World Wildlife Fund Tree Planting

description: Run for a cause, provide medical help to those who need it most. Remember to hydrate!

description: Help us collect school supplies for children around the world. Education is the key!

description: Every child deserves a meal. Your small contribution can make a big difference!

description: Donate blood, save lives! Don't forget to hydrate and have a healthy meal before donating.

description: Let's fight hunger together! Help us distribute food to our community members.

description: Join our workshop to learn more about human rights and what you can do to support the cause!

description: Help us ensure everyone's right to vote. Democracy works best when we all participate!

description: Bring a hammer and help us build homes for families in need. No experience necessary!

description: Community service starts at home. Let's make our town the cleanest it can be!

name: United Way Youth Mentoring Program
description: Become a mentor and make a difference in a child's life. They're our future!

name: Make-A-Wish Foundation Charity Auction
description: Help us raise funds to fulfill the wishes of children with critical illnesses. Let's make dreams come true!

name: Water.org Clean Water Drive
description: Support our mission to provide clean water to everyone. Water is life!

name: The 11th ANNUAL PURPLE RUN
description: Designed for the entire family to run/walk/roll in honor of victims, survivors and all those who have lost their lives to domestic violence.
